channel.title: ExileScape | Re-Opened | Spawn & PK | No 602+ Items | 2007 Style | Dedicated!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/edwsl.png[/img]
[b]KEEP UP TO DATE WITH THE DEVELOPMENT BY [u][url=http://www.exilescape.totalh.com]CLICK HERE![/url][/u][/b]
Dear members,
I've lost the hole interest in a 'economy server' I want to release a dedicated pk server that has many players online.
[b]The features I want it to have;[/b]
• No 600+ items. • 2007 style. • Near perfect combat. • Dedicated staff. • Fair amount of players online (so people don't get bored).
[b]The staff system will work as followed;[/b]
• Player Moderation - a select few to moderate the game world. • Forum Moderation - a select few to moderate the forum board. • Attraction Messengers - well treated advertisers who keep voting and advertisement to a maximum. • Development Assistants - a trusted few to help with low level server development.
[b]Forum software;[/b]
I plan on using SMF reason being; • It's free. • It's easy to use. • Have some nice themes. • You can't rage at me and say "it's nulled".
[b] What have I got in-mind? [/b]
I plan on making a couple of quests you can do to gain such "privileges" e.g.
• Ancient Magics (Desert Treasure). • Lunar Magics (Lunar Diplomacy). • Barrows Gloves (Recipe for disaster).
These's of course won't be the full length of a real RuneScape quest just the main parts.
[b]Wait.. What about voting?[/b]
• I don't want to host a server like the others e.g. [s]VOTE FOR POINTS[/s] or something stupid like that I want players to vote because they know that they are helping out the community. There will of course be a drop party as soon as we reach a certain amount of votes.
[b]Pictures?[/b] • On there way.
[b]Trailer?[/b] • On it's way.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/muijbq.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.title: ExileScape | Re-Opened | Spawn & PK | No 602+ Items | 2007 Style | Dedicated!
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[center]

KEEP UP TO DATE WITH THE DEVELOPMENT BY CLICK HERE!

Dear members,

I’ve lost the hole interest in a ‘economy server’ I want to release a dedicated pk server that has many players online.

The features I want it to have;

• No 600+ items.
• 2007 style.
• Near perfect combat.
• Dedicated staff.
• Fair amount of players online (so people don’t get bored).

The staff system will work as followed;

• Player Moderation - a select few to moderate the game world.
• Forum Moderation - a select few to moderate the forum board.
• Attraction Messengers - well treated advertisers who keep voting and advertisement to a maximum.
• Development Assistants - a trusted few to help with low level server development.

Forum software;

I plan on using SMF reason being;
• It’s free.
• It’s easy to use.
• Have some nice themes.
• You can’t rage at me and say “it’s nulled”.

What have I got in-mind?

I plan on making a couple of quests you can do to gain such “privileges” e.g.

• Ancient Magics (Desert Treasure).
• Lunar Magics (Lunar Diplomacy).
• Barrows Gloves (Recipe for disaster).

These’s of course won’t be the full length of a real RuneScape quest just the main parts.

Wait… What about voting?

• I don’t want to host a server like the others e.g. VOTE FOR POINTS or something stupid like that I want players to vote because they know that they are helping out the community. There will of course be a drop party as soon as we reach a certain amount of votes.

Pictures?
• On there way.

Trailer?
• On it’s way.


[/center]

Read full topic
